about_text: ESMira is a tool for running longitudinal studies (ESM, AA, EMA, ...). Studies can be created over an online interface und participants can either use iOS, Android or a web-browser.
esmira_own_server_get_started: Find out on GitHub how to set up your own ESMira server with only limited IT knowledge.

elements.title: Fully functional offline
elements.desc: ESMira works without a steady internet connection. All functionality of studies are saved locally in the app and saved data are cached and will be uploaded as soon as there is an internet connection.

elements.title: Personal Feedback
elements.desc: Researcher can set up complex charts that will automatically calculated out of data. These statistics can be either personalised to the participants or calculated out of all participants data.

elements.title: Completely anonymous
elements.desc: Each participants gets a random participant id under which all data is collected. ESMira does not collect any personal data at any time.

elements.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="48"><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path><path d="M20 2H4c-1.1 0-1.99.9-1.99 2L2 22l4-4h14c1.1 0 2-.9 2-2V4c0-1.1-.9-2-2-2zm-2 12H6v-2h12v2zm0-3H6V9h12v2zm0-3H6V6h12v2z"></path></svg>
elements.title: Anonymous Chat
elements.desc: Participants can communicate with the researcher from within the app and stay completely anonymous while doing so. Additionally, researchers can sent important messages to all participants of a study.

elements.title: Setup in 5 minutes
elements.desc: To set up you own ESMira server only minimal IT knowledge is required. Just copy the necessary files onto your server, open the main page of ESMira and follow the instructions. More information

elements.title: Completely free
elements.desc: ESMira is developed as a project at Karl Landsteiner University to be used for our own studies. Please mention ESMira when you use it for your own publications.

elements.title: Flexible admin tool
elements.desc: The powerful admin tool allows a wide range of options to set up your study exactly as you need it.

elements.title: Live statistics
elements.desc: The admin tool automatically calculates useful statistics about running studies. And you can always view custom charts right in the web interface.

elements.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="48"><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path><path d="M21 3H3c-1.1 0-2 .9-2 2v12c0 1.1.9 2 2 2h5v2h8v-2h5c1.1 0 1.99-.9 1.99-2L23 5c0-1.1-.9-2-2-2zm0 14H3V5h18v12zm-2-9H8v2h11V8zm0 4H8v2h11v-2zM7 8H5v2h2V8zm0 4H5v2h2v-2z"></path></svg>
elements.title: Online data viewer
elements.desc: You can download study data as a CSV at any time. Additionally, you can view and filter data directly in the admin tool through a flexible data viewer.

elements.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" height="48" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="48"><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path><path d="M2 20h20v-4H2v4zm2-3h2v2H4v-2zM2 4v4h20V4H2zm4 3H4V5h2v2zm-4 7h20v-4H2v4zm2-3h2v2H4v-2z"></path></svg>
elements.title: Full controll over data
elements.desc: All data is sent to and stored in one place only - your own server. The researcher is the only one who has complete control and access to all data.

elements.title: Web, Android and iOS
elements.desc: Participants can use the web interface to fill out questionnaires or use the respective native apps on iOS or Android. The apps in the store are supported and maintained by us. The control over data always stays with you.

elements.title: Open source
elements.desc: ESMira is completely Open Source. Report bugs, give feedback or take part in the development: On GitHub you can find the source code and an extensive wiki for the project.
